name: local-fonts-manager
description: Access local system fonts from Node.js and Electron

scripts.install: node-gyp configure && node-gyp build && rm -rf build/node_gyp_bins
scripts.build: node-gyp configure && node-gyp build && rm -rf build/node_gyp_bins
scripts.rebuild: node-gyp clean && node-gyp configure && node-gyp build && rm -rf build/node_gyp_bins

author: Jaros≈Çaw Foksa
